title: Chris Rock In Talks to Be Oscars 2016 Host!
text:
Chris Rock In Talks to Be Oscars 2016 Host! 
Published By: JustJared.com - Today 
Chris Rock might be hosting the Oscars again – the actor and comedian is reportedly in “serious talks” to host the 2016 telecast, acco... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
